title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that adherents of Islam spread from its hearth.

Two points for explaining how Islam diffused from its hearth.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating the difference in the global spatial pattern of t Buddhism and Judaism.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
